title: Case report of pediatric TTMV-related acute promyelocytic leukemia with central nervous system infiltration and rapid accumulation of RARA-LBD mutations
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Linya Wang, Jiaqi Chen, Bei Hou, Ying Wu, Jun Yang, Xiaosu Zhou, Qihui Chen, Xue Chen, Yang Zhang, Fang Wang, Jiancheng Fang, Panxiang Cao, Mingyue Liu, Yanan Li, Pan Zhang, Yan Liu, Ruidong Zhang, Hongxing Liu, Huyong Zheng
